schema.name: Homemade Spaghetti

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the sausage into bite-sized pieces.
Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add salt, and cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a pan, heat a tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Saut√© the diced onion and sliced sausage until the onion is translucent and sausage is lightly browned, about 8-10 minutes.
Add the cooked spaghetti to the pan with the sausage and onions. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Toss everything together until well combined, cooking for an additional 2-3 minutes.

schema.description: Indulge in this delicious Homemade Spaghetti that marries the goodness of a high-sodium and low-sugar diet, perfectly fitting for those seeking healthy yet flavorful meal options. This dish is part of our 'Healthified Recipes' collection, proving that you can enjoy your favorite meals in a healthier way.
